text: Sommerach is a municipality in Kitzingen in Bavaria in Germany. == Geography == Sommerach is on the southern part of the river Main loop on Wine Island ("Weininsel"). It is 3 km (2 mi.) away from the motorway A3 (exit Kitzingen/Schwarzach/Volkach). ==References== Category:Kitzingen (district)
title: Sommerach
